RE-CYCLE

Home About Contact Routes

Re-Cycling is an eco-friendly, guided cycling tours of 2 towns, Fredrikstad and Sarpsborg. We're mainly focusing on having an enjoyable trip where we'll eat, explore and discover unique traits these 2 cities have to offer. The trip is free, as long as you'll pay for everything you want on the road. We'll mainly explore the old town and large chemistry and electrical engineering buisness operations going on in Sarpsborg. After the tour we'll be exploring nightlife of Fredrikstad and have an enjoyable time.
